name: @idrinth-api-bench/desktop
description: This is a wrapper for framework execution. It provides applications for multiple desktop platforms to previously created run tests.
author: Björn Büttner

scripts.build: npm run drop-dist && vue-tsc && vite build && node tools/fix-index.js && node tools/copy-starter.js
scripts.start: npm run build && node dist/run.js start
scripts.package: npm run build && node dist/run.js package
scripts.make: npm run build && node dist/run.js make
